text:
[Verse]
Golden light so bright
Sky turns to night
Stars shine in the sky
Dreams begin to fly

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the breeze
Dancing through the trees
Hearts begin to sway
In the end-of-day

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams take flight
Colors paint the night
Hold me close tonight
Everything's alright

[Verse 3]
Shadows softly fall
Magic in it all
Moon begins to rise
Lost in your eyes

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams take flight
Colors paint the night
Hold me close tonight
Everything's alright

[Bridge]
In the twilight glow
Time moves so slow
Love begins to show
Never let me go
title: Sunset Dreams
